title: CorTalk: Eating Disorders Through the Lens of Social Brain
description: Eating disorders are not only conditions of food and weight, but of cognition, emotion, and social connection. Dr. Victoria Burmester examines how interpersonal functioning, empathy, and ambivalence shape mental health in young people, using innovative and often disguised approaches to measuring cognition and behaviour. A translational perspective on psychiatry through a social and gestalt lens.
